page.title: 18Fetes and Sales in Braintree
page.content: During the year there are many fetes, bazaars, rummage and jumble sales held in and around the Braintree area. These are mainly used as fund raising events for local charities, schools and other small organisations. Every Saturday morning the Methodist Chapel, on the corner of Sandpit Lane and Rayne Road, holds a coffee morning where customers of the local shops may drop in for a drink and a moment or two of friendship. Other local churches also hold these informal gatherings. Much of the information publicising these local events may either be found in either the Yellow Advertiser or the Braintree and Witham Times. A further source of information may be located on the billboards and hoardings positioned in the centre of town.
